scripts.build:lib: npm run -w @doggo/contracts build && npm run -w @doggo/game-random build && npm run -w @doggo/card-game build
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:product && npm run build:docs
scripts.watch:lib: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/contracts watch" "npm run -w @doggo/game-random watch" "npm run -w @doggo/card-game watch" -n "contracts,game-random,card-game"
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:lib" "npm run watch:product" "npm run watch:docs" -n "lib,product,docs"
scripts.clean:lib: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/contracts clean" "npm run -w @doggo/game-random clean" "npm run -w @doggo/card-game clean"
scripts.dev:lib: concurrently "npm run -w @doggo/contracts dev" "npm run -w @doggo/game-random dev" "npm run -w @doggo/card-game dev" -n "contracts,game-random,card-game"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:lib" "npm run dev:product" "npm run dev:docs" "npm run dev:dev-node-contract" -n "lib,product,docs,dev-node-contract"
